channel.title: 多媒體 on Hugo Site

item.title: 9003《國寶神獸闖天關》
item.description: 《國寶神獸闖天關動畫》 27分鐘 中文版 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RhQGa6TI8pI “大猊” 清郎世寧畫十駿犬蒼猊犬 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3029/ “茹姐” 清郎世寧畫十駿犬茹黃豹 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3030/ “仙尨” 清郎世寧畫花底仙尨 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3031/ 狐猴 清郎世寧畫交阯果然 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3027/ “小麅” 清郎世寧畫瑞麅 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3028/ “白海青” 清郎世寧畫白海青 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3032/ “孔雀” 清郎世寧畫孔雀開屏 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3033/ “雪點鵰” 清郎世寧畫十駿圖雪點鵰 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3034/ 宋郭熙早春圖 軸 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3017/ 清郎世寧百駿圖 卷 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3025/ 名繪集珍 冊 唐韓幹牧馬圖 https://npm.elearn.hrd.gov.tw/base/10060/door/public/posts/3026/
